mapper.select: select r.* from user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id=#{userId}

select p.* from user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r on ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp on rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where u.id=#{userId}
